course_description: The Operations section of the IMPACT360 curriculum focuses on projects that implement the firm's strategy and serves its customers in the most effective way. General topics for these projects include process design, supply chain management and quality management. Projects typically include data analysis of current operations and the construction of models to support decision making for revised operations proposed by the project team.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1273, Section #: 3201, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Rummel, Status: Open
